content.raw: the `roof` link falls in the wind_demo, which is different from ode. i noticed that it is [declared a kinematic link](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e0036a34fdab757971fa56d4b75612bd96f8b3a3/worlds/wind_demo.world?fileviewer=file-view-default#wind_demo.world-35) and maybe dart doesn't support kinematic links? At any rate, it looks like an improvement over the support for this world in dart5, so I wouldn't block this PR over that.
content.html: the roof link falls in the wind_demo, which is different from ode. i noticed that it is declared a kinematic link and maybe dart doesn't support kinematic links? At any rate, it looks like an improvement over the support for this world in dart5, so I wouldn't block this PR over that.
